CREATE VIEW `trans_view_sites` AS select `s`.`id` AS `siteid`,`s`.`hostname` AS `hostname`,`s`.`sitename` AS `sitename`,`s`.`status` AS `status`,`s`.`srcdriver` AS `srcdriver`,(select count(`trans_links`.`id`) AS `count(id)` from `trans_links` where (`trans_links`.`siteid` = `s`.`id`)) AS `linkstotal`,(select count(`trans_types`.`id`) AS `count(id)` from `trans_types` where (`trans_types`.`siteid` = `s`.`id`)) AS `typestotal` from `trans_sites` `s`;
